version_description:
在我们的最新版本中，我们努力修复了一些bug，并让我们的讯息传送功能变得更加强大和流畅。

在此次更新中：
-我们将emoji表情变大了
-增加了搜索功能，你可以更便捷地使用Tandem
-改善了我们的语音讯息功能
在我们的最新版本中，我们努力修复了一些bug，并让我们的讯息传送功能变得更加流畅。
O’zapft is’! 为了庆祝慕尼黑啤酒节, Tandem限时推出为期六周的巴伐利亚语学习活动！快来加入社区并与你的巴伐利亚小伙伴聊聊吧！

We’re excited to announce our brand new logo with the IOS 11 launch!!

Since Tandem launched 3 years ago, we have received hundreds of stories from our warm and friendly learning community. We found Tandem is not only where language learners help and learn from each other, but also where people all over the world embrace cultural diversity, and build friendship with their Tandem partners.

With our Tandem community in mind, we have redesigned our logo with a sleeker, more modern look, while still remaining true to the concept of language exchange.

We want our new logo to reflect Tandem’s friendly and young spirit as well as Tandem’s mission, which is to build a global language learning community that empowers everyone, everywhere to speak any language.

NEW and IMPROVED for our latest release:
- New members can now use our Checklist to tick off their first achievements on Tandem;
- We have improved the log-in process for those using their mobile number;
- For those loving our Translate feature, it is possible to unlock Unlimited Translations as an in-app purchase.

NEW and IMPROVED for our latest release:
- New members can now use our Checklist to tick off their first achievements on Tandem;
- We have improved the log-in process for those using their mobile number;
- For those loving our Translate feature, it is possible to unlock Unlimited Translations as an in-app purchase.

Introducing Tandem Language Levels!
When looking for your perfect Tandem partner, you can now check their language level on their profile:
Beginner: for those who want to make their first steps in language learning and have some basic conversations;
Intermediate: for those with basic skills in their chosen language who want to level up to fluency;
Advanced: for confident speakers who want to perfect their skills and sound like a native.

Here is a guide to picking the right level for you on Tandem: www.tandem.net/language-levels-cefrl-guide.

Introducing Tandem Language Levels!

When looking for your perfect Tandem partner, you can now check their language level on their profile:

Beginner: for those who want to make their first steps in language learning and have some basic conversations;
Intermediate: for those with basic skills in their chosen language who want to level up to fluency;
Advanced: for confident speakers who want to perfect their skills and sound like a native.

The nights are drawing in, there’s frost on the ground… no better time to curl up indoors and practice your languages on Tandem, right?

Lucky for you, we’ve made it easier than ever for you to start your first language exchange with our new Checklist feature. Follow our simple steps once you’ve onboarded to tick off activities and track your progress.

We are sorry to report that app bugs don’t hibernate over winter, so our pest controllers/developers have been hard at work tracking them down and fixing them for this update.

As always, any early christmas cards (or general feedback) can be sent to support@tandem.net.

Dear Tandem members and friends,
Ho ho ho! Thank you all for the long, long, long, long, long list of app features you want this year for Christmas.
I read the list, and checked it twice, and now I have some VERY special updates in my sack for those who have been nice this year!
First off the sleigh, we have... Holiday Cards! These limited-edition cards are in 11 languages, so you can share some festive cheer with your Tandem partners this month.
Secondly, 21 specially-designed festive stickers will be available to share through iMessage.
And a gift for our Korean members… the app is now available in the Korean language! You can change your language to Korean in your phone settings. As they say in Korea, 즐거운 성탄절 보내시고 새해 복 많이 받으세요!
Wishing you good tidings and Christmas cheer,
Santa Claus*
*with substantial help from the Tandem elves in Berlin

Ho ho ho! Thank you all for the long list of app features you want this year for Christmas.

First off the sleigh - Tandem Pro is here! Subscribe for special features like unlimited translation, language games, profile visit analysis and more!

Secondly, we have... Holiday Cards! These limited-edition cards are in 10 languages, so you can share some festive cheer with your Tandem partners.

Merry Christmas!
Santa Claus*

*with help from the Tandem elves in Berlin

New Year, New Tandem. We’re pleased to announce our extra special, turbo-charged premium subscription, Tandem Pro!
Tandem Pro unlocks great features like unlimited translation, language games, profile visit analysis and more.
Oh, and no more pesky ads ;)

This update is one for our travel-loving members! Discover the new “Tandem Travels” feature to find out which countries other members are heading to this summer. Give travel tips, share recommendations, teach useful phrases or even buddy up. Happy travels!

Everyone has a different style of learning languages on Tandem. That’s why we’ve introduced “Learning Preferences” - to help you work out what type of learner you are and find language exchange partners that match your style of learning. High five!
Introducing our brand-new demo feature. It allows you to have a sneak preview of what being Tandem member is like before you officially join the community. Check it out during onboarding!

It’s still winter here in Berlin but we promise we’re not hibernating (much…)

Instead we’ve been working hard on some important bugs and design fixes for this update.

We’ve also added the option to log in with WeChat :)

As ever, contact the team on support@tandem.net if you have any issues or questions.

It’s still winter here in Berlin but we promise we’re not hibernating (much…)

Instead we’ve been working hard on some important bugs and design fixes for this update.

We’ve also added the option to log in with WeChat :)

As ever, contact the team on support@tandem.net if you have any issues or questions.

As the World Cup kicks off in Russia, we’re launching a super-special feature to help you become a language champion!
Introducing... Tandem Fanzone

The Fanzone is a special area of the app where you can chat with your partners about the latest results and learn new things about football around the world. You can also show your support for a team in the World Cup by adding badge to your profile. We’ll be counting down the days to the final by keeping you updated on country has the most supporters!

Improve your profile with our new feature!
Now easily change your profile picture with new facial recognition technology and add up to six additional photos to your profile.

Improve your profile with our new feature!
Now easily change your profile picture with new facial recognition technology and add up to six additional photos to your profile.

Improve your profile with our new feature!
Now easily change your profile picture with new facial recognition technology and add up to six additional photos to your profile.
Delightful news! Profiles on Tandem received a long deserved redesign: More clarity, less clutter, and more focus on the languages of your future exchange partners!
We’ve been working hard to get rid of those small, pesky bugs. This update includes a fix for the bug causing the Community Feed to freeze.

Get a taste of the Oktoberfest lingo with Tandem!
Learn how to say ‘cheers’ in different languages with our new Oktoberfest-themed postcards.

Overcome your language learning fears with Tandem this Halloween!
This version introduces spooky Halloween-themed cards to the app to bust common myths surrounding difficult languages.

- A small design revamp to our registration and login processes
- New in-app messages to keep you up-to-date on all the latest news, features and promotions
We’re always working on improving our app for our lovely language learners! You can now access the Tandem blog directly from the My Profile screen and get all the latest news from Tandem HQ

Ho ho ho! Tandem 3.0 is coming to town!
This fresh update introduces our new Icebreaker feature so you never run out of things to talk about with your Tandem partner.
To get you in the festive spirit, we’ve also added firework animations that are triggered when you complete certain language learning actions.

Ho ho ho! Tandem 3.0 is coming to town!
This fresh update introduces our new Icebreaker feature so you never run out of things to talk about with your Tandem partner.
To get you in the festive spirit, we’ve also added firework animations that are triggered when you complete certain language learning actions.

Everyone has a different style of learning languages on Tandem. That’s why we’ve introduced “Learning Preferences” - to help you work out what type of learner you are and find language exchange partners that match your style of learning. High five!

One thing that’s really important to us is guiding our members through their language learning journey. To keep you on the right track, we’ve added a few “first steps” and “next steps” for you to aim to complete.

We’ve also got some good news for our members using Tandem on an iPad. You can now use the app in landscape mode! You’re welcome :)

We've been spring cleaning! Update the app for the latest bug fixes.
We’ve been working hard behind closed doors to ensure a smooth app experience for all you language lovers. Update the app for the latest bug fixes and performance improvements. It’s our pleasure!

We are super excited to reveal two sparkly new features! A transliteration feature for incoming messages and a Pro feature to find a Tandem partner in a specific city via our “search by city” filter. Happy language learning!

Not only have we been busy practicing our Afrikaans, but we have also been working on perfecting our app so you can continue doing your language learning thing! Update the app for the latest bug fixes and performance improvements. Geniet! (“enjoy” in Afrikaans)

Happy 2020 to all of our awesome Tandem members! Here’s to a year full of exciting updates and new features. Stay tuned!

Isn’t it about time you can share your Tandem profile with your language exchange partners and find friends on Tandem? We think so, too! That’s why we’ve just introduced Tandem IDs. Tandem IDs are like usernames. With them, you can share, save, and search for profiles, all within the app.

Head to the "About Me" section of your profile and secure your unique username now!

What do Mandalorian, Ido, and Zaza all have in common? They are part of over 100 new languages that have just been added to the app! If you are practicing, fluent or native in an indigenous, fictional, or sign language, update to the latest version, and get practicing!

Let’s get this update on the road! This version gives Pro members access to our brand new Tandem Maps feature. Preparing for your long-awaited vacation and looking to practice languages with a local Tandem partner? Dive into the “Map” tab, click on your favorite city, and explore all the Tandem partners available in that city.
